:::Abominus/Battera/Starscream:::

::Abominus was a hit some of the shots.  He fired 4 shots at Galaxor::
~~~~~
::Starscream looked to Battera::
Starscream: Well, it looks like it'll be awhile before you're a full 
Predacon.  What do you say i show you around?
::Battera smiled::
Battera: I'd like that.
::So Starscream showed her the whole base.  he finally took her to the mess 
hall::
Starscream: Would you like a drink?
Battera: Sure.
::They got a drink and sat down::
Starscream: So, tell me about yourself.
Battera: Well, when i came to this planet, i was a Predacon from the faction 
you are at Civil War with.  But soon after, i joined a bot named Vulois, and 
together with him, Soundwave, and Cybershark, we fought for peace.  I was 
sent to the Maximals to negotiate peace talks, but i didn't get anywhere.  So 
i left with my boyfriend Cybershark, and together we were Destrons, but then 
he disappeared.
::She had a sad look on her face when she mentioned Cybershark's leaving::
Battera: And the rest is history.  You saved my life, and im here.
Starscream: Wow. You HAVE been through a lot.
::He still felt that wierd feeling deep inside of him.  I like this girl, he 
thought.  By now, battera was tired::
Starscream: Want me to get you some quarters?
Battera: Sure.
::he found an empty room::
Starscream: So, here you are.
Battera: Yep. Oh, thanks for showing me around.
::She kissed him on the cheek and went inside. Starscream walked back to his 
own quarters himself, and went to sleep, thinking about Battera::

--part1_83.9fb3f8b.2814c914_boundary
